title: Group portrait of six women and two men, including one far right wearing light colored shirt, polka dot necktie, and dark jacket, seated at table with light lace colored tablecloth, food, and candles, in interior with two doors, and plaques and signs on light colored wall, some which read "Boy Scouts of America Troop Charter", "Council Operated Camp Boy Scouts of America Camp Clearance Certificate", "It's fun to be a Scout", and "Fort Negley Camporee Participation Award 1954"
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
